Multi-currency eWallet

Multi-currency eWallet is a tool that allows you to calculate total value of a eWallet based on current exchange rates published daily by European Central Bank.

Simply select one of the 33 avaliable foreign currencies and we'll convert it and add it to your eWallet.
You can always change your base currency - we'll update your eWallet automatically!
